items.title: Primary diagnosis — T‑lymphoblasts (lymphoma); staging
items.summary: Initial workup confirmed lymphoma with T‑lymphoblastic features; baseline tests and staging completed.
items.details: Hematology consult, imaging and biopsies established the diagnosis and stage. Baseline cardiac and lab assessment recorded before therapy.

items.title: Chemotherapy against lymphoma (T‑lymphoblastic)
items.summary: Systemic chemotherapy with supportive care; adjuvant radiation therapy.
items.details: Planned cycles with interim response checks and end‑of‑treatment assessment. Radiotherapy delivered for consolidation: ~30 sessions.

items.title: Relapse — T‑lymphoblastic lymphoma (diagnosis)
items.details: Diagnostic reassessment reconfirmed T‑lymphoblastic lymphoma; systemic therapy restart indicated.

items.title: Chemotherapy with adjunct radiotherapy ×30; massive GI bleed with MI
items.summary: Chemo resumed with radiotherapy; GI ulcer bleed led to myocardial infarction; therapy continued after stabilization.
items.details: Severe anemia and tachyarrhythmia managed with transfusions and critical care. Radiotherapy delivered alongside chemotherapy: ~30 sessions.

items.title: Aggressive leukemia with extreme leukocytosis — diagnosis
items.summary: Leukocytes >300k; diagnosis established; cytoreductive plan initiated.
items.details: Rapid leukemic process (Ph+ features later); urgent cytoreduction and transfusion support were indicated.

items.title: Chemotherapy against aggressive leukemia
items.summary: Prolonged systemic chemotherapy to reach CAR‑T eligibility and disease control.
items.details: Escalating/adjusted regimens aimed at bringing leukocytes below CAR‑T threshold; infections managed along the way.

items.title: Systemic shock with paralysis and amnesia
items.summary: Resuscitated; prolonged neurological deficits with gradual recovery.
items.details: Acute collapse required resuscitation. Afterwards: paralysis, memory loss and slowed cognition; stepwise recovery under neurologic guidance.

items.title: Invasive fungal infection with sepsis
items.summary: Severe oropharyngeal focus with systemic involvement; treated successfully.
items.details: Managed in hospital with antimicrobials; concurrent arrhythmias and prior micro‑stroke noted during 2022.

items.title: COVID‑19 pneumonia (ICU, intubation) and GI bleed; recovery
items.summary: Critical COVID‑19 with intubation; GI bleeding; coma; unexpected recovery.
items.details: Rapid pneumonia progression on immunosuppression; post‑ICU recovery followed by stabilization.

items.title: Respiratory arrest (revived) and bacteremia; high‑dose chemo
items.summary: Cardiorespiratory event reversed; rare cardiac‑source bacteremia treated; intensified chemo to reach CAR‑T criteria.
items.details: Therapy escalated to reduce leukocytes below CAR‑T threshold; infections managed.

items.title: CAR‑T cell therapy
items.summary: CAR‑T administered; severe toxicity managed (fever, neurologic and cardiac events).
items.details: High fever, vomiting, transient leg paralysis, cardiac event and profound memory loss consistent with neurotoxicity; gradual recovery thereafter.

items.title: Allogeneic stem‑cell infusion — brother donor
items.summary: Allogeneic stem cells infused as consolidation after CAR‑T.
items.details: Engraftment phase under strict infection control; outpatient recovery thereafter.

items.title: Large abdominal mass; aggressive Hodgkin lymphoma
